item.description:
Evening of Spirit Communication with Maria Halvorsen 
    6:30-8:00 p.m.  Limited to 10.  Everyone receives a reading. (RSVP and register with Maria directly) Everyone loves this event with Maria...she brings highly tuned gifts to access those in heaven.
  Spirit medium Maria Halvorsen returns to provide warm messages from your loved ones in heaven. Everyone receives a reading. Maria is a gifted psychic medium who serves to bring healing messages to people from loved ones who have passed.  Maria is well loved, heartful and filled with integrity. To register please contact Maria at 508-208-7139 or visit her website at www.mariahalvorsen.com   and go to the special events page.  Fee:  $50.  Mastercard and Visa are accepted.  Seating is limited:  register in advance.

   For other events held at A Higher Balance Healing Center go to http://www.ahigherbalance.com/
item.how_to_find_us: Enter at door next to H&R Block; go up one flight to 6B
item.name: Evening of spirit communication with Maria Halvorsen, psychic medium
